attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the interest of the British people we the undersigned request the water and gas and electricity suppliers be Nationalised as soon as possible.

Our request for Nationalisation is in response to massive profits recently announced by these utility suppliers. Profit has continually been added to world wholesale prices which is both unacceptable and unaffordable
households.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
